full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML content appears to be a complex Facebook-related page structure with no actual fact-check article content. The HTML snippet seems to contain mainly UI and styling elements, navigation components, and placeholder divs, but no substantive text or fact-check report.

To extract a fact-check article, I would need the complete HTML content that includes the actual text of the fact-check investigation. Could you please provide the full HTML content of the fact-check article?

If you have the HTML content, please re-submit it, and I'll be happy to process it according to the guidelines you specified.
title: The SLAJ iVerify Network of Fact-Checking Desk has fact-checked a viral social media claim that the current US Ambassador to Sierra Leone, David Dale Reimer has been removed from his office because of involvement in Sierra Leone politics and found it to be false.
vclaim: The SLAJ iVerify Network of Fact-Checking Desk has fact-checked a viral social media claim that the current US Ambassador to Sierra Leone, David Dale Reimer has been removed from his office because of involvement in Sierra Leone politics and found it to be false.
